hibernate-mapping.query: from Item it order by it.id
from Cliente cl order by cl.id
from Categoria ca order by ca.id
from Pedidos pe order by pe.id
from DetallePedido dp order by dp.id
from FormaPago fp order by fp.id
from PagoCheque pc order by pc.id
from TarjetaCredito tc order by tc.id
from Item it where it.categoria.id =:idCategoria order by it.id
from Cliente cl where cl.ciudad =:ciudad order by cl.id
from Cliente cl where cl.cedula =:cedula order by cl.id
from Pedidos pe where pe.cliente.id =:cliente order by pe.id
from Pedidos pe where pe.estatus =:estatus order by pe.id
from Pedidos pe where pe.fecha >= :fechaIni and pe.fecha <= :fechaFin and pe.cliente.ciudad =:ciudad order by pe.id
from Pedidos pe join pe.formaPagos fp where fp.id =:idPago
from DetallePedido dp where dp.pedidos.id =:idPedido order by dp.id
